name: RPG Maker VX Ace Project File

description: To create a RVPROJ2 file, select File → New Project... , name the folder it will be contained in, name your game, choose your save location (it's best to leave it at the default location), and click OK .

Unless you change the save location, the RVPROJ2 file is located inside your project folder with your customized game .EXE file in the following location: C:\​Users\​[username]\​Documents\​RPGVXAce\​[projectname]

common_filenames.description: Game.rvproj2 - Default name given to the RVPROJ2 file be default upon creation of your project.
